Interface DameGUIInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GUI

    Interface to be implemented by the GUI

    0.1
    Author:
    MajorTwip

    • Method Detail

      • showMenu

        void showMenu()
        Starts the application if not already running and shows the menu

      • showBoard

        void showBoard(Board bard)
        Starts the application if not already running and shows the game
        Parameters:
        bard - Board with the actual Gamestate

      • closeApplication

        void closeApplication()
        Close the application

      • initiateTurn

        void initiateTurn()
        Indicates the player's turn.

      • showMessageBox

        boolean showMessageBox(MessageBox msgbox)
        Shows a MessageBox. Returns true if Confirm/OK was clicked
        Parameters:
        msgbox - MessageBox to be shown
        Returns:
        Boolean, true if OK/Confirm was clicked

      • animateMove

        void animateMove(Stone stone,
                 Coordinate coordinate)
        Animates a move. Only visual effects, no changes to the board will be applied. Reloads the actual gamestate with getActualBoard() afterwards
        Parameters:
        stone - Stone to move
        coordinate - Coordinate to move to

      • animateStoneRemove

        void animateStoneRemove(Stone stone)
        Animates the disappearance of a stone. Only visual effect, no changes will be applied Reloads the actual gamestate with getActualBoard() afterwards
        Parameters:
        stone - Stone to remove
